climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 1.85'' HD full-touch color screen and DIY Dials: smartwatches for men and women come with a 1.85-inch full-touch color screen for an ultra-sharp and wide viewing experience.The GloryFit app also offers more than 200+ online personalized dial backgrounds to choose from, and you can create DIY photos to customize your personalized dials.

100+ SPORTS MODES AND IP68 WATERPROOF: Fitness watch for men and women supports more than 100 sports modes (running, dancing, yoga, cycling, hiking, etc.), the watch comes with a pedometer to track your steps, calories, distance, time, training exercises and routes in your daily life, and real-time data tracking to help you adjust the intensity of your training to achieve the best training results. Fitness sports watch with IP68 waterproof function can meet your daily waterproof needs.

Bluetooth Call and SMS Notification Function: you can make/receive calls without taking out your mobile phone. With a built-in microphone and speaker, in addition to traditional notification functions (messages from Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, etc.), the smartwatch can easily receive and make calls via Bluetooth, play music phone from your mobile phone and support AI voice assistant. You can always stay in touch with your family and friends, whether you're in a busy work environment or out an

HEALTH MONITORING FUNCTION: The smartwatch adopts high-precision motion sensors and supports heart rate/blood oxygen/blood pressure/sleep monitoring. It can track your heart rate and sleep status (deep sleep/light sleep) for 24 hours to help you better understand your physical health. In addition, it has practical functions such as weather forecast, brightness adjustment, stopwatch, alarm clock, sedentary reminder, watch search and so on.

EXTRA LONG BATTERY LIFE AND EXCELLENT COMPATIBILITY: The watch is equipped with a high-capacity battery, which can provide you with up to 7 days of working time and 30 days of standby time with a single full charge (2 hours). Whether you are traveling or on a business trip, you don't have to worry about it running out of battery. The fitness watch is compatible with Android 5.0 or iOS 9.0 and Bluetooth 4.0 or higher smartphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to pair, and instructions are clear, read a critic that distance/temperature etc. is in Metrics but there is a simple way in settings to change it to imperial.Battery is great already 4 days and its still full, plenty of faces to choose and also very sensitive to wrist movement, also very good recording sleep/bp/oxigen.Highly recommend,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This smartwatch is so cool!
reviews.reviewText: I just could not help but love the pink straps of this smartwatch!! It just stands out.And of course, its capability is to be appreciated as well. Aside from its pretty look, it functions very well and keeps up with my active lifestyle.Never turning back with this watch! Love it. ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing battery life
reviews.reviewText: The battery lasted an entire week without charging. Attractive screen settings and syncs with your phone. Text messages come through (although can’t reply from your watch), and there are a ton of exercise options. It even lets you know if your heart rate gets too high. Great smart watch for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Had to return and get refund within hours!
reviews.reviewText: Nothing worked properly on this except for the time & weather. Step count, calorie were both completely inaccurate. And I wasted over an hour trying figure where my workouts went…. There was no way to log workout or even any acknowledgment that a workout was done. Got a refund and ordered a different watch, hope this one work better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: What a great little inexpensive watch that works wonders. This was exactly what I was looking for. The number of watch faces is amazing..sooo many to choose from! The battery lasts so long,I found the watch is very accurate at telling me how many steps I’ve taken. It is set in Celsius which can be confusing but overall it’s very useful. The band was super comfortable easy to put on and fits my medium sized wrist perfectly. Good products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The battery lasted a lot longer than my last smart watch. The band fits my wrist easily. I love the color. Easy to read numbers. It took a bit to pair with my phone but after it was paired it was awesome! I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Used this product to track steps, heart rate, answer and make phone calls. Clear sound when calling from the watch and on the receiving end of the calls, people say it’s very clear. Synced to my Samsung phone with ease. So many other options that I am still learning.

reviews.reviewerName: Bien empaquetados y con buena dureza en el algodón
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A mi me ha servido mucho, se concretó de maravilla con mi telefono

Comprato per curiosità, l audio è ottimo, riceve e telefona perfettamente, visibile anche al sole, la batteria mi dura più di una settimana, un paio di ore di ricarica e si riparte. Il Design fa la sua figura.... Consigliato per chi vuole spendere poco ed avere un buon servizio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I personally like the watch has good battery life and was easier to set up in comparison to most watches the features on the watch are pretty nice to especially like the heartbeat monitor just make sure that the watch is on your wrist properly if you want an accurate reading

J ai acheté la montre pour un anniversaire 🎂. La personne en voulait une depuis très longtemps toutes les options y sont. Tres rapide à installer avec son téléphone. Rend très au poignet. Je recommande et ne regrette pas mon achat.

Es un reloj muy cómodo que me permite hacer todo lo que necesito ya que hago bastante deporte pero también se puede llevar para vestir normal. Es compatible con Android e iOS, cosa que veo bastante importante. Tiene todo lo necesario ya que hace tanto de pulsera de actividad como de reloj deportivo (pasos, sueño, deportes, etc,...). Sin duda un reloj perfecto para el día a día

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This smart watch is excellent value for money. The display is so clear on par with the premium watches I have seen. I bought this as a gift and she is very impressed. The strap is really comfortable and doesn't cause irritation which she is very prone to so I am relieved .The battery is insanely good and the item looks really cool. If it wasn't pink I'd probably kept it myself :-). The health monitoring is perfect and there are plenty of nice features. Very easy to use too. you can connect it all to the app if that's what you want to do and it isn't complicated. It will be hard to find better value anywhere. Thank you
